QuestData.Title: Death to Mor'ghor
QuestData.Description: The time has come. Mor'ghor dies today.$B$BBe warned, $c. Demon blood courses through his wretched veins, and he channels unnatural power. He will be destroyed, yes. But it will not be an easy fight.$B$BYou remember where Mor'ghor resides, at the top of the camp. I will meet you there. Finish him!$B$BBe sure to recruit 3 Dragonmaw followers if you are short - you will need our help.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mor'ghor survived Outland. But he won't survive this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Warchief Mor'ghor in Dragonmaw Port. You can still recruit Dragonmaw Merchants and Workers to help you.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n! You have done the Horde proud in my absence.$B$BThe Dragonmaw have joined us, with Zaela as their new leader. Blood was shed, but casualties were low, and we have their complete loyalty.$B$BOur Horde grows stronger!
